channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Grzegorz Gątkowski

item.title: Chess analyzer
item.description: I am really into chess, so made streamlit visualization chess stats app. I used Chess.com official API. This API allows you to view all sorts of chess.com information through Python, including leaderboards, player rankings, moves in a game, etc. Link to GitHub Repository Link to Streamlit App
